title: Alleyhill: The Complete Series
description: || ALL 3 NOVELS + 2 NOVELLAS ||Seventeen-year-old Ellicia Wayfield's life changed for the worse a year ago. Now living in a new town with her stepmother, it isn't hard to tell that something is . . . off. The lingering question is "what?"Despite the warning bells in her head, curiosity and weird occurrences lead Ellicia into discovering that she is the newly-assigned Protector of the hell gates. Suffice to say . . . she did not see that coming.With those close to Ellicia keeping secrets, her task is bound to be a difficult one. Who exactly can she trust? Nathan? Deana? Maybe, maybe not.• • •​Explore Ellicia Wayfield's journey from the very beginning in this book bundle.NOVELS INCLUDED:- The Becoming- The Awakening- The BeckoningNOVELLAS INCLUDED:- Dearest Ellicia- Broken Wings
author: Kemdi Ik
